description: CloudStackZone is the Schema for the cloudstackzones API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: CloudStackZoneSpec defines the desired state of CloudStackZone

network.description: The network within the Zone to use.

id.description: Cloudstack Network ID the cluster is built in.

name.description: Cloudstack Network Name the cluster is built in.

type.description: Cloudstack Network Type the cluster is built in.

status.description: CloudStackZoneStatus defines the observed state of CloudStackZone

ready.description: Reflects the readiness of the CloudStack zone.
